Ancient Breastplate.name: Ancient Breastplate
Ancient Breastplate.description: A tarnished thick breastplate of ancient origin.

Ancient Double Layer Mail.name: Ancient Double Layer Mail
Ancient Double Layer Mail.description: A heavy and rotten double-layered mail of ancient design. Not comfortable to wear but still useable.

Ancient Mail.name: Ancient Mail
Ancient Mail.description: An old and crusted heavy mail of ancient design. Some parts are missing, but it still offers decent protection.

Ancient Plated Mail Hauberk.name: Ancient Plated Mail Hauberk
Ancient Plated Mail Hauberk.description: An ancient mail armor with plated arm guards. Very heavy and severely limiting the mobility of the wearer.

Ancient Plated Scale Hauberk.name: Ancient Plated Scale Hauberk
Ancient Plated Scale Hauberk.description: A heavy coat of scales, partly reinforced with a layer of plated metal on top. It's a massive armor of ancient origin that didn't age well.

Ancient Plate Harness.name: Ancient Plate Harness
Ancient Plate Harness.description: Made of thick metal plates and mail, this heavy ancient armor still offers great protection after countless years. It's crusted and rotten in parts, however, severely limiting the mobility of the wearer.

Ancient Scale Coat.name: Ancient Scale Coat
Ancient Scale Coat.description: A heavy and tarnished scale coat of ancient design that belongs into a collection, not on the battlefield.

Ancient Scale Harness.name: Ancient Scale Harness
Ancient Scale Harness.description: A sturdy, but heavy and partly decayed ancient scale harness.

Animal Hide Armor.name: Animal Hide Armor
Animal Hide Armor.description: Heavy hides patched together to create a decent makeshift armor.

Apron.name: Apron
Apron.description: A leather apron usually worn by apprentices and craftsmen.

Aspect of Davkul.name: Aspect of Davkul
Aspect of Davkul.description: A grisly aspect of Davkul, an ancient power not from this world, and the last remnants of %sacrifice% from whose body it has been fashioned. It shall never break, but instead keep regrowing its scarred skin on the spot.

Basic Mail Shirt.name: Basic Mail Shirt
Basic Mail Shirt.description: A basic and simple mail shirt. Offers decent and affordable protection against slashing and piercing attacks.

Blotched Gambeson.name: Blotched Gambeson
Blotched Gambeson.description: A padded gambeson that has seen lots of patching and repairing.

Butcher's Apron.name: Butcher's Apron
Butcher's Apron.description: A rugged apron worn by butchers to protect against accidental cuts.

Coat of Plates.name: Coat of Plates
Coat of Plates.description: One layer of padding, one layer of strong mail, and heavy metal plates riveted ontop. A very heavy armor that offers great protection.

Coat of Scales.name: Coat of Scales
Coat of Scales.description: A heavy armor made of thick, overlapping metal scales covering most of the body.

Cultist Leather Robe.name: Cultist Leather Robe
Cultist Leather Robe.description: A thick leather armor covered with additional leather patches and occult insignia.

Decayed Coat of Plates.name: Decayed Coat of Plates
Decayed Coat of Plates.description: A somewhat decayed coat of plates with rusted metal and brittle leather parts. Has probably been laying in the open for a while.

Decayed Coat of Scales.name: Decayed Coat of Scales
Decayed Coat of Scales.description: This coat of scales is worn and parts have come lose or are missing. It still offers very good protection if you don't mind the smell.

Decayed Reinforced Mail Hauberk.name: Decayed Reinforced Mail Hauberk
Decayed Reinforced Mail Hauberk.description: A long mail shirt in bad condition. Some rings are missing and it is covered in dirt and has an odd smell about it.

The Emperor's Armor.name: The Emperor's Armor
The Emperor's Armor.description: A shining armor once worn by the emperor of an age long past, made from the most woundrous of materials, imbued with mystical energies. Light reflects easily off the polished armor, turning the wearer into a shimmering figure of light during the day.

Footman's Armor.name: Footman's Armor
Footman's Armor.description: A transitional armor consisting of a long mail shirt and a rivetted leather gambeson.

Gambeson.name: Gambeson
Gambeson.description: A sturdy and heavy padded tunic that offers decent protection.

Heavy Iron Armor.name: Heavy Iron Armor
Heavy Iron Armor.description: This armor is made from heavy metal plates, scales and pieces of chainmal. The true armor of a northern warrior.

Heavy Lamellar Armor.name: Heavy Lamellar Armor
Heavy Lamellar Armor.description: A heavy lamellar armor that covers most parts of the body with thick, overlapping metal plates for maximum protection.

Heraldic Mail.name: Heraldic Mail
Heraldic Mail.description: A heavy and extraordinarily well crafted mail hauberk with added mail mittens and a padded undercoat. Only a true master could craft an armor like this.

Hide and Bone Armor.name: Hide and Bone Armor
Hide and Bone Armor.description: Hide and bone are common materials in the northern regions. This armor is using both for decent protection.

Armor of the Ijirok.name: Armor of the Ijirok
Armor of the Ijirok.description: Once a barbarian armor broken in battle, this piece has been bathed in the blood of the legendary Ijirok. Powers beyond your understanding mended it whole again, and will likewise mend any wounds of the wearer as well.

Lamellar Harness.name: Lamellar Harness
Lamellar Harness.description: A body armor made of thick overlapping metal plates that cover most of the upper body.

Leather Lamellar Armor.name: Leather Lamellar Armor
Leather Lamellar Armor.description: Numerous overlapping leather plates provide decent protection for most of the upper body.

Leather Scale Armor.name: Leather Scale Armor
Leather Scale Armor.description: A mail shirt worn under a thick leather scale armor for added protection.

Leather Tunic.name: Leather Tunic
Leather Tunic.description: A leather vest ontop of a cloth tunic for improved protection.

Leather Wraps.name: Leather Wraps
Leather Wraps.description: Various patches of rough leather sewn together.

Light Scale Armor.name: Light Scale Armor
Light Scale Armor.description: A sturdy yet flexible armor composed of small, overlapping metal scales.

Linen Tunic.name: Linen Tunic
Linen Tunic.description: A simple cloth tunic. Fashionable but offering little in protection.

Mail Hauberk.name: Mail Hauberk
Mail Hauberk.description: A long and heavy chainmail that offers good protection but is very fatiguing to wear.

Mail Shirt.name: Mail Shirt
Mail Shirt.description: A mail shirt with shoulder guards providing excellent protection against most weapons.

Monk's Robe.name: Monk's Robe
Monk's Robe.description: A rugged, large robe made of simple cloth usually worn by monks and similar individuals who don't care for fashion.

Noble Mail.name: Noble Mail
Noble Mail.description: A truly masterfully crafted set of mail armor. Very light and flexible to reduce encumberance while still offering good protection.

Noble Tunic.name: Noble Tunic
Noble Tunic.description: A fine linen tunic of exquisite material, embroided with pleasing patterns. Fashionable but offering little in protection.

Padded Leather.name: Padded Leather
Padded Leather.description: A padded tunic reinforced with leather fittings for added protection.

Padded Surcoat.name: Padded Surcoat
Padded Surcoat.description: A cloth mantle padded with woolen filling.

Patched Mail Shirt.name: Patched Mail Shirt
Patched Mail Shirt.description: This light mail shirt has seen better times but still grants decent protection.

Dark Rugged Surcoat.name: Dark Rugged Surcoat
Dark Rugged Surcoat.description: A dark padded leather mantle, stuffed for added protection, with a pelt coat.

Rugged Surcoat.name: Rugged Surcoat
Rugged Surcoat.description: A padded leather mantle stuffed for added protection. Usually worn under armor.

Reinforced Animal Hide Armor.name: Reinforced Animal Hide Armor
Reinforced Animal Hide Armor.description: A reinforced animal hide armor fashioned from thick leather pieces with added mail and metal scales.

Reinforced Mail Hauberk.name: Reinforced Mail Hauberk
Reinforced Mail Hauberk.description: A mail hauberk reinforced with shoulder pauldrons and a riveted leather armor for added protection.

Rugged Scale Armor.name: Rugged Scale Armor
Rugged Scale Armor.description: A heavy body armor made from thick iron scales.

Scale Armor.name: Scale Armor
Scale Armor.description: A body vest with overlapping scales worn over a small mail shirt.

Scrap Metal Armor.name: Scrap Metal Armor
Scrap Metal Armor.description: This armor is pieced together from scavenged metal parts that are fixed to a crude leather tunic.

Sellsword's Armor.name: Sellsword's Armor
Sellsword's Armor.description: A long leather coat reinforced with metal plates worn over a sturdy mail hauberk.

Dark Thick Tunic.name: Dark Thick Tunic
Dark Thick Tunic.description: A dark and thick cloth tunic consisting of multiple layers to protect against weather and scratches.

Thick Furs.name: Thick Furs
Thick Furs.description: Thick furs that are crudely dried and tied together to protect from both the cold and any incoming blows.

Thick Plated Barbarian Armor.name: Thick Plated Barbarian Armor
Thick Plated Barbarian Armor.description: A heavy armor that is made from mostly metal. Only one chosen by the ancestors will own a set like this.

Thick Tunic.name: Thick Tunic
Thick Tunic.description: A thick cloth tunic consisting of multiple layers to protect against weather and scratches.

Direwolf Hide Armor.name: Direwolf Hide Armor
Direwolf Hide Armor.description: A thick leather armor skillfully crafted from the pelt of a giant wolf. Donning the skin of a beast like this can turn one into an imposing figure.

Direwolf Mail Armor.name: Direwolf Mail Armor
Direwolf Mail Armor.description: A skillfully crafted mail shirt with the pelt of a giant wolf ontop. Donning the skin of a beast like this can turn one into an imposing figure.

Wizard's Robe.name: Wizard's Robe
Wizard's Robe.description: A cloth robe coverd in all kinds of mystical ornaments and symbols.

Worn Mail Shirt.name: Worn Mail Shirt
Worn Mail Shirt.description: A reinforced mail shirt that lost some parts over the years.
